Handmaiden0200340cjpavplpirjhvkzv4qk4knyhksd6y11767412015-03-13T22:06:39ZSharp Blades26158496A '''handmaiden''' or '''handmaid''' is a woman in service of a noblewoman, either a Queen or a noble lady.

Women of vassal houses sometimes also serve as hand maidens and companions to noble ladies in the household of their overlords or at the royal court.
sections.Known handmaidens:
*{[[Doreah]]}, a [[Lys]]eni pleasure [[Slavery|slave]] purchased to serve as handmaiden to [[Daenerys Targaryen]]. Locked inside [[Xaro Xhoan Daxos]]' vault for treason.
*{[[Irri]]}, a [[Dothraki]] handmaiden of Daenerys Targaryen, killed by an agent of Xaro Xhoan Daxos.
*[[Jhiqui]], a Dothraki handmaiden of Daenerys Targaryen, status unknown.
*{[[Shae]]}, a [[Lorath]]i handmaiden of [[Sansa Stark]] and, secretly, [[Tyrion Lannister]]'s concubine. Murdered by Tyrion after he discovers her naked in his father's bed.
*[[Missandei]], a [[Naath]]i freedwoman in Daenerys Targaryen's service as handmaiden, herald, and translator.
*An [[Unidentified handmaiden|unidentified handmaiden]] in service of [[Sansa Stark]], but reporting to Queen [[Cersei Lannister]].
*An [[Margaery's handmaiden|unidentified handmaiden]] in service of [[Margaery Tyrell]].
*[[Sera Flowers]], also in service of Margaery Tyrell.Â
